name: Makeup Fashion Salon
description:
Are you Dreaming of being a freelance make up artist, a make up guru, a professional make up artist? Well you can start from here! Show how talent you are by creating your own make up fashion design. We promise you that you will find every style, every design you have ever thought of here. We have made make up a pleasure, a daring try, a design, or even a career here!

>>Features<<
--4 Different Themes: School Day, Party Time, Prom Season and Music Festival.
--15 different applications: hairstyle, foundation, blush, eyeshadow, shiny eyeshadow, eyebrow, lipstick, shiny lipstick, contact lens, earring, hair accessories, necklace, mascara, eyeliner, eyelash
--Exclusive EYESHADOW, LIPSTICK, ACCESSORIES COLLECTIONS For each different theme.
--15 BLUSH colors and styles to choose from.
--Various HAIRSTYLES to choose from for different occasions.
--20 EYESHADOW with different colors, shapes and styles of EACH THEME.
--20 LIPSTICK colors of EACH THEME.
--Various MASCARA colors and styles, everything you can think of.
--If mascara is not enough for you, We do have the fabulous EYELASH section.
--16 Bold and daring CONTACT LENS styles.
--24 Best Designed Accessories of EACH THEME.
--Unique Makeup Styles: Elegant, Fresh looking, Trendy, Edgy, Bold, Daring and even Emo & Gothic.
--Take a photo of your makeup fashion design and share it with your friends!

Any Ideas and suggestions?
Bug Reporting?
Other?
